name: Gigabite
description:
The Monster King died and now there is a new baby monster to replace it.

Baby Belzebubb needs to be fed every 10 seconds or he will be really, really hungry…

We must take care of our new king!

Controls

Check on the top of the screen what the baby monster wants to eat and drag and drop the food items into its mouth before the 10 seconds timer runs out.

Leaderboard

This game uses leaderboards to keep track of the best players, so don't hesitate to play again to try and dominate the board with your amazing score!

Credits
  • Art and Idea by @vein
  • Programming by @stefan-laimer
  • Music, sounds and leaderboards by @cocapasteque
